verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [ARGM-TMP: just] [V: secured] [ARG1: the release of the last three American detainees in North Korea] , President Donald Trump announced on Twitter on Wednesday .

[ARG1: The Trump administration just secured the release of the last three American detainees in North Korea] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] .
